description: Try our easy to follow Banana & Strawberry Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana & Strawberry Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into 4 small glasses and decorate each with a cocktail stick threaded with banana slices and strawberry halves for the children to dip.
Pour into 4 small glasses and decorate each with a cocktail stick threaded with banana slices and strawberry halves for the children to dip.
